links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
prog: (MAGMA) [n eq 1 select 0 else IsEven(n) select Self(n div 2)+1 else 10*Self((n+1) div 2): n in [1..60]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Mar 07 2013
